title._content: [Unidentified man and woman, seated, facing front] (LOC)

description._content: Grice, F., photographer. [Unidentified man and woman, seated, facing front] [ca. 1855] 1 photograph : sixth-plate daguerreotype, hand-colored. Notes: Case: ornamental circle, variant. Barboza number: 6019.063. Stamped on brass mat: F. Grice. Title devised by Library staff. Served by appointment only. Material requires special handling. For more information, see: www.loc.gov/rr/print/info/617_apptonly.html Purchase; Anthony Barboza; 1999; (DLC/PP-1999:022). Forms part of: Daguerreotype collection (Library of Congress). Format: Daguerreotypes--1850-1860. Group portraits--1850-1860. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: Daguerreotype collection (Library of Congress) (DLC) 95861318 For more information about this collection, see www.loc.gov/pictures/collection/dag Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/cph.3g12729 Call Number: DAG no. 1336
